verbs.description: With Trump undaunted in his quest to [V: build] [ARG1: a wall between the U.S. and Mexico] , the U.S. pavilion at the 2018 Venice Architecture Biennale will look at issues of citizenship and the border — and the ways in which it remains incredibly porous .

With Trump undaunted in his quest to build a wall between the U.S. and Mexico , the U.S. pavilion at the 2018 Venice Architecture Biennale [V: will] look at issues of citizenship and the border — and the ways in which it remains incredibly porous .

With Trump undaunted in his quest to build a wall between the U.S. and Mexico , the U.S. pavilion at the 2018 Venice Architecture Biennale will look at issues of citizenship and the border — and [ARGM-MNR: the ways] [R-ARGM-MNR: in which] [ARG1: it] [V: remains] [ARG3: incredibly porous] .
